name: Warning The Floor Is Lava
description:
One day with a laser pointer I made the point jump around the room I’m not allowed to leave.

There's loads of toilet paper - help yourself to some.

-

WASD / Arrows - Move
Space - Jump (hold to jump higher)
Shift -  Run

-

Say safe everyone - wash your hands - and  S T A Y   H O M E

April 2020
